Guest pricing

How much you charge is entirely up to you. Enter the price you want each guest to pay and discover what you earn. Learn more

Individual rate
Each guest pays
USD
Per instance:Private groups

This is the base price you will receive for hosting a private group, even if fewer guests attend. For example, if you set the minimum price at $200, you’ll receive this amount even if 1 guest books

You can set an additional charge per guest beyond the minimum number. For example, if your minimum price covers up to 5 guests, you can charge extra for each guest that joins after that. This ensures you’re compensated for larger group sizes.
